messages.subject: Mohammed needs your assistance
messages.body:
Received: from web30612.mail.mud.yahoo.com () 

DEAR SIR, 

I am Mohammed Panamar, a liberian by nationality but presently a refugees in Ghana with my mother and younger sister.My father was a successful gold merchant before his death.He was actually killed by rebels in our country during the war.Sir Please i need your help. My late father deposited some money to a security company here in Ghana , which was just revialed to me by my father's lawyer.He said my father intended to transfer this money to a foreign country for investment.

According to the document shown to me, i am his next of kin to the $38,000,000 and 250kg alluvia Gold dust he deposited at the security company.

All i need now is for you to help us transfer and invest this money in your country and also get us out of this refugees camp.I will highly appreciate your kindness and be grateful if only my request is granted.

Thanks and Godbless, 
Mohammed Panamar.
messages.raw:
Mohammed Panamar

Subject: Mohammed needs your assistance
Date: Thu, 28 Apr 2005

Received: from web30612.mail.mud.yahoo.com ([68.142.201.245])

DEAR SIR,

I am Mohammed Panamar, a liberian by nationality but presently a refugees in Ghana with my mother and younger sister.My father was a successful gold merchant before his death.He was actually killed by rebels in our country during the war.Sir Please i need your help. My late father deposited some money to a security company here in Ghana , which was just revialed to me by my father's lawyer.He said my father intended to transfer this money to a foreign country for investment.

According to the document shown to me, i am his next of kin to the $38,000,000 and 250kg alluvia Gold dust he deposited at the security company.

All i need now is for you to help us transfer and invest this money in your country and also get us out of this refugees camp.I will highly appreciate your kindness and be grateful if only my request is granted.

Thanks and Godbless,
Mohammed Panamar.

Mr. Panama, 

I am not trying to play with your time. I have no objection helping you recover your late father's money but you haven't told me what you want me to do. Also I would like to see some sort of documentation verifying that this money actually exists.

Weiner Crumbley

messages.body:
Mr. Panama, 

Unfortunately, I don't have a fax available to me at the moment. I work at a bar here in Chicago, Illinois, and we have no fax machine here. Please scan the documents you have and send as email attachments.

I would also add that my boss would be very upset if he knew I was engaging in financial activities outside the bar, so I must ask that we keep this extremely confidential. I appreciate your help on this.

Weiner
messages.raw:
Weiner Crumbley

Sent: Sunday, May 2, 2005

Mr. Panama,

Unfortunately, I don't have a fax available to me at the moment. I work at a bar here in Chicago, Illinois, and we have no fax machine here. Please scan the documents you have and send as email attachments.

I would also add that my boss would be very upset if he knew I was engaging in financial activities outside the bar, so I must ask that we keep this extremely confidential. I appreciate your help on this.

Weiner

[The next two were sent to me a total of 14 times...]

messages.body:
Mohammed (I hope you don't mind if I use your first name), 

I realize the trauma you've been through and I know how anxious you are to secure your fathers money and alluvia gold dust, but you need to slow down a bit. You sent your last two messages to me fourteen times. You filled up my mailbox, kiddo. Lighten up a little.

Muhammed, I am very serious about this. I'll contact your lawyer today. By the way, what exactly am I supposed to tell him?

Weiner
messages.raw:
Weiner Crumbley

Mohammed (I hope you don't mind if I use your first name),

Muhammed, I am very serious about this. I'll contact your lawyer today. By the way, what exactly am I supposed to tell him?

Weiner

messages.body:
Mr. Batutu, 

I am the partner of the late Mr. Panama and I am in the process of recovering funds that we jointly deposited. His son, Mohammed, has advised me that you can be of assistance in helping me to receive these funds.

Please advice me on what steps need to be taken. 

Sincerely, 
Weiner Crumbley
messages.raw:
Weiner Crumbley

Mr. Batutu,

I am the partner of the late Mr. Panama and I am in the process of recovering funds that we jointly deposited. His son, Mohammed, has advised me that you can be of assistance in helping me to receive these funds.

Please advice me on what steps need to be taken.

Sincerely,
Weiner Crumbley

messages.body:
Mohammed, 

Ok, I sent a note off to Mr. Batutu asking for his assistance. I'll let you know what I hear back. 

So tell me a little about yourself, Mohammed. How old are you? Do you have a profession? What do you intend to do once we have recovered the money and alluvial gold dust?

You mentioned that you have a younger sister - how old is she? Is she married? 

Awaiting your response. 
Weiner
messages.raw:
Weiner Crumbley

Mohammed,

Ok, I sent a note off to Mr. Batutu asking for his assistance. I'll let you know what I hear back.

So tell me a little about yourself, Mohammed. How old are you? Do you have a profession? What do you intend to do once we have recovered the money and alluvial gold dust?

You mentioned that you have a younger sister - how old is she? Is she married?

Awaiting your response.
Weiner

[Ah, at last the learned Barrister. Catch the quote at the bottom...]

messages.subject: Response
messages.body:
From the Desk of: Barrister Joseph Batutu 
Ogudu & Odudu Chambers, 
No. 5 Cow-Lane, High Street, 
Accra-Ghana 
+233 243 585 776 
+233 244 924 193 
Jobatutu@Justice.com 

Attn: Weiner Crumbley, 

I am in receipt of your email.. It's gone past 9Am, in the morning here in Accra-Ghana and I need to be at the court. Please leave your number and I will give you a call when I return from Court to give you details verbally, before I email you with details.

Waiting to get your number, so that we can communicate effectively. 
Best regards, 

Barrister JOSEPH BATUTU 

"CONSCIENCE IS AN OPEN WOUND, ONLY THE TRUTH CAN HEAL IT" BARRISTER JOSEPH BATUTU.(ESQ)

i am very happy for your quastion,as for me im from a wealthing family my father was a honest man he always gives help to the community ,he take care of utility, electricity,many different public acctivities, and i have lean that from my late dad.and my dad truthfull man one mind strenth man and he respect courage ,that is i just like that like my father.i was a student due to my late father's wealth i did not focouse in my school bbut i can express my filling to any bbody creacted by ALMIGHTY FATHER ALAH GOD.and only him who can delievered us.TO others quastion what i intend to do with my money is utilize it big lucreative business,infact i will invest BBIG.my younger sister i will give her the best education.any way my younger sister is a little girl is 16 years old and i take her as one of my best property,she take me like too.any way she have'nt married, i we take time to look for a good husband and ALMIGHTY will do that for me.

i know as time goes on you will know her,my younger one she does'nt like any thing head very simple girl like my mother.

Anyway what was your discoustion with the barrister, what does he told you? you will tell me so that in the document in my possition i will knowq what to do ok.now listen to me we are not playing over this transaction, and want you to know that GOD has bless you as my beneficiary, all details relate to the barrister any he tell you please inform me ok.as the gold matter i will look over to it ,anyway i will keep some in my private maesiuom,i will use some gold to mood my late father's status image and my great ground chirldren will see my late father's image because my late father.s was a hero, a great man and a breave man.i have promise that i will give that honor to my late father.

my father told me that one , there will bbe no problem.

messages.body:
Mike, 

What the hell are you talking about? Nobody is looking to run off with your money. And who are you calling a tyrant? 

Listen, buddy, let's get something straight right now. You were the one who first contacted me, not the other way around. I said I was willing to help you but I'm starting to have second thoughts because of your accusations and attitude. And by the way, you haven't shown me a single piece of evidence that this money and the alluvial gold dust even exists.

There was no information to report from the barrister. All he said is that he is going to email the details to me. That's it.

If you still have a problem let me know and we will halt this transaction immediately. 

Weiner
messages.raw:
Weiner Crumbley

Mike,

What the hell are you talking about? Nobody is looking to run off with your money. And who are you calling a tyrant?

Listen, buddy, let's get something straight right now. You were the one who first contacted me, not the other way around. I said I was willing to help you but I'm starting to have second thoughts because of your accusations and attitude. And by the way, you haven't shown me a single piece of evidence that this money and the alluvial gold dust even exists.

There was no information to report from the barrister. All he said is that he is going to email the details to me. That's it.

If you still have a problem let me know and we will halt this transaction immediately.

Weiner

[Ah, an apology, and we're back to Mohammed...]

messages.subject: FORGET THE BARRISTER I WILL CONTACT MY LATE FATHER'S BARRISTER
messages.body:
Hello Weiner, 

How is you and your family doing? I am very sorry for the misunderstanding that is going on between us, i didnt mean to call all those names but because of the way the lawyer was talking me, it is not you im talking to but its the lawyer who i had a little argument with.The lawyer even told me u didnt send him your phone number so that he can contact u but i now realise that the lawyer isnt being straight with me so i dont want to do anything with that lawyer and im now contacting my late father's barrister so support the job for us, You are someone that i believe God himself sent to me that can help me and my family here so please do not say u are having second thoughts about this for it is a genuine transaction that i am having all this trust in you to handle it for me.The way you talk to me i now know that u are a reliable and gentle person and im sorry the misunderstanding because u are not the one i am accusing i was accusing the lawyer.

Sorry for asking this question sir, but how old are u and which country u from? For evidence so u can have 100% trust in me i will show the documents and all the details how my late father deposited this fund.I will contact my late fathers lawyer for u so we can do this without any delay.

i will do that any moment from now ok. 

iam waiting to read from you. 
mohammed

Lewd

i am waiting to read from you.
mohammed.

messages.body:
Mohammed, my brother, 

Fulk me? Oh yeah? Well listen to this, you dick-headed mugu. Do you think for a minute that I didn't know what you were up to when I got your first email. Yours was about the worst 419 attempt I've ever come across.

Listen, turd-breath, you're never gonna make a dime at this so why don't you give it up. You're just wasting all your money sitting in that internet cafe trying to fool people into believing your refugee crap. Refugee my ass.

Here, refugee THIS! 

I got half a mind to come over there and get tribal on your ass, Homes. It's a good thing for you I'm busy working with Mariam Abacha next week. Next time you see her you should thank her for saving your scrawny little ass.

So fulk you too. 

All the best, 
Weiner

messages.body:
Mohammed (or John, as the case may be), my old friend, 

As a bartender, one of my main responsibilities is to give advice. People come in here, except on Karaoke night when the music is too loud, and want to bounce their problems off someone, just to get a different point of view if nothing else.

You have inspired me to start a '419 Scammer Counciling Service'. I think I have the experience know-how to help you dimwits change your lives around. You are going to be my first client, so lay back, make yourself comfortable, and listen to what I tell you.

This is no career for you. First of all, 419-scamming is a thing of the past and nobody falls for it anymore. The only ones who respond to those slimy letters you guys send are people who like to dick with you. Secondly, you're no good at it. You expected me to believe that you were a refugee sitting on millions in cash and gold dust. Mohammed/John, trust me, that dog won't hunt.

Here's what you do - go get a newspaper, turn to the help-wanted section, and get yourself a JOB. You're obviously not the sharpest knife in the drawer, so keep it simple, something that doesn't require a lot of thinking. Well, in your case, maybe something that doesn't require ANY thinking would be better.

Take up a hobby, join a healthclub, find something else to occupy your time. And you gotta stay away from the internet cafes, you're only wasting your time and money there. While I'm on the subject, if you know a guy in there who claims to be Mariam Abacha and/or one of her sons, lean over and tell him I'm on to him too. Then the two of you head down to the gym I just told you to join and pump each other.

Ok, Mohammed/John, take my advice for what it's worth. And do stay in touch. 

Fulk you too. 

Your bestest pal and advisor, 
Weiner

Weiner Crumbley
